## Offer to Purchase - Forage and Grain Harvesting
- **Document ID**: cb-5675-46512636
- **Government Tender**: sollicitationNumber: 01B46-23-026
- **Publication Date**: 2023-05-18
- **Deadline for Submission**: 2023-06-07T14:00:00

## Description of Work
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites proposals for the procurement of forage and grain harvesting services at its Normandin Research Farm located at 1468 St-Cyrille Street, Normandin, Quebec, G8M 4K3, for the 2023 season. 

## Pre-Submission Site Visit
Firms intending to submit a proposal are strongly encouraged to attend a pre-submission site visit on May 29, 2023 at 9:30 AM, Eastern Daylight Time, at the Normandin Research Farm. However, attendance is not mandatory, and participation will not be a factor in the evaluation of proposals.

## Evaluation and Submission Requirements
Sealed proposals must be submitted to AAFC no later than 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time) on June 7, 2023. The proposals must include all required specifications, plans, and drawings, which can be obtained through the Canadabuys service provider. Addenda, if issued, will be available through the same channel.

## Inquiries and Clarifications
All inquiries and clarifications must be directed to Marie-Pier Parent, the AAFC Contract Officer, at aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information
The contracting entity is Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The contact person is Marie-Pier Parent, and his contact information is as follows: email: aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca, phone: (438) 455-8237, and fax: None.

## Requirements and Assessment Criteria
Interested Firms are required to obtain all relevant specifications, plans, and drawings through the Canadabuys service provider. AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal, in whole or in part, without prior negotiation and to reject any or all proposals received.
